amendment.description: An amendment printed in Part A of House Report 108-497 and considered as adopted pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 645. The amendment corrects a drafting error and specifies that under H.R. 2729, three (rather than two) of five members will be required to constitute a quorum of OSHRC.

action.text: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.
Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment reported by the House Committee on Rules.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rules amendment (A001) Agreed to pursuant to H. Res. 645.
